poem:
Title: Reflections from the Mirrored Ark

In Rotterdam, an ark of mirrors sets sail,
On the sea of our collective imaginations. 
A place where echoes of Escher prevail,
In staircases created for lost explorations. 

From above, from below, and from all sides,
Treasure troves appear to the wandering eye.
A sublime voyage where discovery collides,
With the whimsy of the mirroring sky.
